text: "(Old Dogs, Children and) Watermelon" is a 1972 song by Tom T. Hall and is the second and final single from his 1972 studio album The Storyteller. It topped the country singles chart in the United States and Canada and went to number 21 in Australia and number 17 in New Zealand. It was covered by Frankie Laine and John Prine. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1974. Category:1972 songs Category:Country songs Category:Frankie Laine songs
title: (Old Dogs, Children and) Watermelon Wine
